name: SPACE BLASTER 8 BIT
description:
■ They have briefly left by your ship in an asteroid Hagel theirs. Now you have landed to hostile area. Now you must only survive.



■ They have briefly left by your ship in an asteroid Hagel theirs. Now you have landed to hostile area. Now you must only survive.

■ Their ship is a movement in duration. They must navigate her ship themselves.

■ The ship automatically shoots.



■ Collect mighty power ups!

■Call allied troops for the help.

■Use different mighty weapons.



■They can play together to every time with a friend.

■Collect together points and destroy your enemies.

■They should not collide on the listeners to degrees of difficulty with each other.
